snippet: China’s central bank chief, Zhou Xiaochuan, said Sunday that the nation’s currency has reached its equilibrium rate, signaling that major movement in its value is unlikely soon.
abstract: China’s central bank chief Zhou Xiaochuan says nation’s currency has reached its equilibrium rate, signaling that major movement in its value is unlikely soon.
lead_paragraph: China’s central bank chief, Zhou Xiaochuan, said Sunday that the nation’s currency has reached its equilibrium rate, signaling that major movement in its value is unlikely soon.

headline.seo: China Contends Market Sets Value of Its Currency
headline.main: China Asserts Market Setting Currency Value
headline.print_headline: China Asserts Market Setting Currency Value
